when I did a preview of the surge - a
few weeks back I said that combat was
essentially more of the same this wasn't
right unbeknownst to me a number of new
game systems had been added that go a
long way toward expanding on the surges
already excellent combat systems they
just don't crow about them too loudly so
you might not see them unless you're
paying attention the biggest change is
the addition of a parry mechanic a
directional block modification can be
applied that shows you which direction
enemies are attacking from if you hold
the block button and press a directional
button at the precise moment of impact
you'll parry the attack and set up for
huge counter damage the system is
actually fairly easy to use and has some
pretty generous timing windows so even
those are less confident with a system
like this are probably gonna get some
use out of it the real appeal though
will be for hardcore players who value
mechanics that raise skill ceilings if
you want to do multiple new game+ runs
or speedruns or you just want to push
yourself on your first playthrough this
mechanic alone is gonna add a lot to
your time with the game beyond that it's

there are little like secure OHS
